base_work_dir.description: Directory to run the docking simulation

outside_binding_site_penalty.description: scoring functions using precalculated grids use value to fill grid points outside the binding site definition

enable_sulphur_acceptors.description: Scoring of sulphur acceptors (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

ligand_intra_score.description: Simple heavy-atom clash terms (clash) or all-atom Lennard-Jones term (clash2)

rigid_all.description: Rigid protein and rigid ligand docking (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

chemplp_clash_include_HH.description: Scoring of hydrogen-hydrogen interactions (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

plp_burpolar_e.description: Well-depth for occluded polar PLP interactions

plp_tors_weight.description: Weight for the ligand torsional potential

chemplp_charged_hb_weight.description: Weighting factor (multiplier) for charged hydrogen bonds

chemplp_charged_metal_weight.description: Weighting factor (multiplier) for charged acceptor-metal interactions

chemplp_hbond_weight.description: Weighting factor neutral-neutral and neutral-charged hydrogen bonds

chemplp_metal_weight.description: Weighting factor for neutral acceptor-metal interactions

chemplp_plp_burpolar_e.description: Well-depth for occluded polar PLP interactions

chemplp_tors_weight.description: Weight for the ligand torsional potential

rescore_mode.description: Perform simplex optimization during rescoring (simplex) or only direct input conformation scoring (no_simplex)

search_speed.description: Search speed setting as: highest reliability, slowest setting (speed1), good reliability, twice as fast as speed1 (speed2) or modest reliability, four times as fast as speed1 (speed4)

protein_file.description: Target protein structure in mol2 format

ligand_file.description: Source ligand structure to dock. Multi-structure mol2 suported

flip_amide_bonds.description: Flipping of amide bonds (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

flip_planar_n.description: Flipping of bonds next to planar nitrogens (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

flip_ring_corners.description: Flipping of free ring corners (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

force_flipped_bonds_planarity.description: Automatic planarity correction for flippable bonds (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

force_planar_bond_rotation.description: Free rotation of planar bonds (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

bindingsite_center.description: Center coordinates of the binding-site sphere

cluster_structures.description: Number of structures generated by the cluster algorithm

cluster_rmsd.description: RMSD similarity threshold for cluster algorithm

write_ranking_links.description: Output of ranked soft links (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_protein_bindingsite.description: Write protein binding site only (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_protein_conformations.description: Output of protein conformations for scoring functions chemplp (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_merged_protein.description: Output of merged protein files (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_merged_ligand.description: Output of merged ligand files (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_merged_water.description: Output of merged water files (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_protein_splitted.description: Write fixed and dynamic parts of the protein in separate files (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

write_per_atom_scores.description: Output of per molecule atom scoring values; partial atom charges are replaced (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

merge_multi_conf_output.description: Merge of multiconformer output. This is only carried out for ranked databases (activate (1) or deactivate (0))

min_cluster_size.description: Minimum cluster size for coordinate based clustering

threshold.description: Minimum RMSD threshold for defining clusters. Same a the 't' argument in the scipy.cluster.hierarchy.fcluster package

criterion.description: Cluster criterion used by the fcluster method (scipy.cluster.hierarchy.fcluster)
